title: Place a Medication Order (CPOE)
description: A physician needs to order a new medication for a patient.

tasks.description: Open the patient's chart and navigate to the 'Orders' section.
tasks.expected_outcome: Physician accesses the order entry module for the correct patient.

tasks.description: Search for the medication, select the correct dosage, route, and frequency.
tasks.expected_outcome: Physician correctly selects 'Lisinopril 10 mg tablet, by mouth, once daily'.

tasks.description: Sign the order, which sends it electronically to the pharmacy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Physician successfully signs the order, and it appears in the pharmacy's queue to be verified.
